app_description.message: Use native tab discard method to automatically reduce memory usage of inactive tabs

options_period01.message: Discard inactive tabs after (in seconds) (use zero second to disable auto tab discarding)

options_period02.message: when the number of inactive tabs exceeds

options_url_based.message: Only discard the following inactive hostnames

options_tab_context.message: Display discarding items in the "tab" context menu (if supported)

options_page_context.message: Display discarding items in the "page" context menu

options_link_context.message: Display "Open Link in New Discarded Tab" item in the "link" context menu

options_favicon.message: Change favicon of discarded tabs (if possible)

options_memory.message: Discard a background tab if its memory usage (totalJSHeapSize) exceeds (in MB)

options_audio.message: Do not discard a tab when media is playing

options_pinned.message: Do not discard a tab when it is pinned

options_form.message: Do not discard a tab when form changes are not yet submitted

options_battery.message: Do not discard tabs when computer is connected to a power source

options_online.message: Do not discard tabs when there is no internet connection and tab is not cached

options_notification_permission.message: Do not discard a tab if it can display desktop notifications

options_whitelist.message: Tabs with the following hostnames are not being discarded:

options_click_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

options_go_hidden.message: Discard a tab if it is hidden

options_use_cache.message: Use Cache: If enabled, the extension only checks once whether a tab is pinned or the browser is connected to a battery source

options_footnote_1.message: It is possible to use regular expression matching with "re:" keyword. For instance to whitelist all URLs with "google" keyword in them use "re:google".

options_footnote_2.message: Check the totalJSHeapSize value of top document. If this memory exceeds the user-defined value (minimum acceptable value is 10MB), the tab will be discarded. Note that this option is only available if your browser supports 'window.performance.memory'

options_footnote_3.message: When the discarding period is over for a tab or a new tab is added, all browser's tabs are checked to evaluate which tabs need to be discarded. This option forces the extension to limit these checks. The minimum acceptable value is 1 second. The recommended value is 30 seconds.

options_check_delay.message: Minimum delay between sequential discarding checks (in seconds)

options_favicon_delay.message: Delay for painting the discarded favicon (in milliseconds)

popup_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

popup_whitelist_domain.message: Always Keep Tabs for This Site

popup_allowed.message: Keep This Tab for This Session

menu_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

menu_whitelist_domain.message: Always Keep Tabs for This Site

menu_open_tab_then_discard.message: Open Link in New Discarded Tab

menu_msg3.message: Cannot discard a tab when it is active

cmd_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

cmd_whitelist_domain.message: Always Keep Tabs for This Site
